description:
Want to learn how to sell more books on Kindle but don't know where to start? Do you want an A-Z system to show you step-by-step how to do it?

The "How to Self Publish a Book on Kindle and Sell More Books" course is your step-by-step blueprint for researching, creating, self publishing and selling more books on Amazon. This course takes you through my same exact steps that I've personally used to become a 3 times #1 International Best-Selling Author that consistently makes profits.

Learn:

  • How do I sell more books on Amazon?
  • How do I find profitable topics?
  • What kind of book should I publish?
  • What are the costs for self publishing a book?
  • How can I get more people to buy my book?
  • How to finish the book in 14 days or less?
  • How to self publish the book in 24 hours or less?
  • and much more!

This course is intended for motivated and determined entrepreneurs or business owners who want to sell more books on Amazon Kindle, become an instant authority in your niche market, build your list, make more profits, get more customers, and generate a passive income. All you need is a positive attitude and the determination to get it done!

As a member of the "Kindle Cash Conversion Secrets" course, you'll also have instant access to self publishing secrets that Kate only shares in her private coaching programs.

Take your time and go at your own pace. Be sure to check out our privacy policy and terms of use .

Earnings Disclaimer:

While we have made every attempt to show you how to create a profitable book as well as a best-seller, we cannot guarantee that you will make a certain amount of income. Your profits are solely based on your efforts to take action with what you've learned.
title: How To Self Publish a Book on Kindle and Sell More Books
